content: Hi, I need some documentation or explanation for SimpleQuantity if someone can help
What is your question? Documentation is here: http://hl7.org/fhir/datatypes.html#quantity except you don't use the comparator element.

Thanks for the answer, but I really need to know what includes Simple Quantity. From the documentation i read already this, but there is a
Note that the constraint is different from the other specializations of Quantity because it is not a type, just rules applied where the Quantity type is used. There's another constraint - see Money immediately below.
Still not understanding what your specific question is @Tihomir Petrov. Are you wanting to know all the places where SimpleQuantity is referenced?

I already understood what is SimpleQuantity. It's the same as Quantity, but without comparator.
Thanks all!
